content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'alice_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [alice_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://alice@adlstrnsolar.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE BRONZE.D_VENDAS (
	[NUM_VENDA] int,
	[DATA_VENDA] datetime2(7),
	[ID_CLIENTE] int,
	[ID_VENDEDOR] int,
	[STATUS] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'bronze/VENDAS/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [alice_adlstrnsolar_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM BRONZE.D_VENDAS
GO
